content.text:
The work on the right was painted by <image 1>

A. Angelica Kauffmann
B. Peter Paul Rubens
C. Thomas Gainsborough
D. Benjamin West

The painting in the image is "The Death of General Wolfe" by Thomas Gainsborough. Therefore, the correct answer is:

C. Thomas Gainsborough
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
